verses.text: God \w has|strong="H8199"\w* taken \w his|strong="H7130"\w* \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* divine \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w*: \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* gods \w he|strong="H7130"\w* holds \w judgment|strong="H8199"\w*.

“\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* crookedly \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w favor|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*? \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs*

\w Do|strong="H7326"\w* \w right|strong="H6663"\w* \w by|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w weak|strong="H1800"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w orphan|strong="H3490"\w*, \w acquit|strong="H6663"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w innocent|strong="H6663"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w Rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w weak|strong="H1800"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w needy|strong="H1800"\w*, \w save|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

“\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* insight, \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w fro|strong="H1980"\w*, while \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth’s \w foundations|strong="H4144"\w* \w totter|strong="H4131"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w appointed|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* gods, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

Yet \w like|strong="H4191"\w* mortals you \w will|strong="H8269"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, you \w will|strong="H8269"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* \w any|strong="H4191"\w* \w prince|strong="H8269"\w*.”

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* yours \w by|strong="H6965"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w*.
